text:
Hey! Do you want to be able to understand
fast-speaking natives like Billie and Ellen?

Well, with our Fluent with Friends course 
can help you to do it.

Every week for 48 weeks, you will learn English
with the first two seasons of the series Friends,

along with 20+ page PDF Power Lessons,
vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Global Fluency Circle community,
and so much more.

And you could try it for FREE right now
with our 3-part Masterclass.

Just click up here or down
in the description below
to learn more and Sign Up.

Hey! Every single week, we help learners
like you understand fast-speaking natives

without getting lost,
without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles.

Just like Swayam, who says that
we have helped him to improve

his vocabulary and his writing
with our lessons.

And you can too! All you have to do
is hit that subscribe button and the bell down below
so you don't miss any of our new lessons.

So you probably already know
the interviews are a fantastic way to learn English,

how it's really spoken by natives
like Billie Eilish.

You can check out all of our lessons featuring
interviews in this playlist.

Awesome job today! 
I hope you enjoyed a lot of that lesson
with Billie Eilish, and you can check out
more lessons with other celebrities in this playlist.
Now, it's time to go beyond the classroom,
and LIVE your English!
Aww yeah!
